tasks.title: Design Patterns Task 1
tasks.description: Introduction to UML and the basics of design patterns.

tasks.title: Design Patterns Task 2
tasks.description: Implementing Factory, Abstract, and Singleton design patterns.

tasks.title: Design Patterns Task 3
tasks.description: Applying Adapter, Builder, and Prototype design patterns.

tasks.title: Design Patterns Task 4
tasks.description: Using the Proxy design pattern for controlling access.

tasks.title: Design Patterns Task 5
tasks.description: Implementing Flyweight, Decorator, and Bridge design patterns.

tasks.title: Design Patterns Task 6
tasks.description: Applying the Facade design pattern to simplify complex systems.

tasks.title: Design Patterns Task 7
tasks.description: Utilizing Command and Memento design patterns for command handling and state management.

tasks.title: Design Patterns Task 8
tasks.description: Applying State, Iterator, Observer, and Template Method design patterns.

tasks.title: Design Patterns Task 9
tasks.description: Implementing the Visitor design pattern and understanding SOLID principles.
